    • Constructor Detail

      • SslSocketManager

        public SslSocketManager(String name,
                OutputStream os,
                Socket sock,
                SslConfiguration sslConfig,
                InetAddress inetAddress,
                String host,
                int port,
                int connectTimeoutMillis,
                int delay,
                boolean immediateFail,
                Layout<? extends Serializable> layout,
                int bufferSize)
        Deprecated. Use SslSocketManager(String, OutputStream, Socket, SslConfiguration, InetAddress, String, int, int, int, boolean, Layout, int, SocketOptions).
        Parameters:
        name - The unique name of this connection.
        os - The OutputStream.
        sock - The Socket.
        inetAddress - The Internet address of the host.
        host - The name of the host.
        port - The port number on the host.
        connectTimeoutMillis - the connect timeout in milliseconds.
        delay - Reconnection interval.
        immediateFail -
        layout - The Layout.
        bufferSize - The buffer size.
